commands.name: az storage container metadata show
commands.summary: Return all user-defined metadata for the specified container.
commands.syntax:
az storage container metadata show --name
                                   [--account-key]
                                   [--account-name]
                                   [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                   [--blob-endpoint]
                                   [--connection-string]
                                   [--lease-id]
                                   [--sas-token]
                                   [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage container metadata update
commands.summary: Set one or more user-defined name-value pairs for the specified container.
commands.syntax:
az storage container metadata update --name
                                     [--account-key]
                                     [--account-name]
                                     [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                     [--blob-endpoint]
                                     [--connection-string]
                                     [--if-modified-since]
                                     [--if-unmodified-since]
                                     [--lease-id]
                                     [--metadata]
                                     [--sas-token]
                                     [--timeout]
